data.message: I think it’s funny as hell that people are all butt hurt over Eminem dissing Trump. You all do realize he’s dissed previous presidents going all the way back to B. Clinton right? SMDH

replies.message:
Exactly why it's corny as fuck 20 years later, especially when you have libtard snowflakes doing the SAME SHIT on a daily basis. 

Em was outlandish and of the unpopular opinion or "silent majority". Now's he's the same as the rest of the pussies.

Trying to recall an actual Clinton diss...”you want me to fix up my lyrics while the president gets his dick sucked” <not a diss so much.... “March stomp push fuck Bush” < yep that’s a diss ... he’s always just dissed republicans
Jeff Jenkins"ripped her tonsils out and fed her sherbet." Hillary rip. Oh yah trump supporters feel that no one else has ever been criticised by entertainers or the media-please. Get over it!

Diana Unterweger get over the fact that Trump is your president. Trump didn't split or divide this country. It was the ones trying to force their opinions and views down your throat while disrespecting you the entire time.
It wasn't his diss of Trump, it was his diss to any and all fans of his that supported Trump. And also his newfound love for the establishment, which is the antithesis of his persona up until now.

Joseph Montaldo someone had to win & lose. Didn't vote for either one of the duopoly system. You're preaching to the wrong one. My vote was a cry for real change! Keep thinking republican vs.democrat,its not going to change anything. So yeah,keep your liberal Democratic comments to yourself. Didn't vote that way sheep.
I'm low-key trump supporter i don't feel butthurt words are words. I have a feeling my comment might show my friends feed.
Not him dissing Trump but okay.
When did he dis BO?  I think he was fully indoctrinated into the Hollywood taint-licker circle by the DO years
The problem I have is when he said fuck you at his fan in the original video before it was edited out
Diana Unterweger are you trying to sound uneducated. It's completely obvious you didn't comprehend the straight forward comment I made.

Your comments are hollow. They didn't address or relate to my comments in any way.
The moment you called me names you showed that you are part of the problem in this country.

It's like you got upset and mad and felt they need to say something so you could call me fake bs names. What are you basing your pure ignorance on? Blind ignorant assumptions.  Ps you're so fos.
